name: LogMeIn
description: LogMeIn, Inc.’s category-defining products unlock the potential of the modern workforce by making it possible for millions of people and businesses around the globe to do their best work, whenever, however, and most importantly, wherever. A pioneer in remote work technology and a driving force behind today’s work-from-anywhere movement, LogMeIn has become one of the world’s largest SaaS companies with tens of millions of active users, more than 3,500 global employees, over $1.3 billion in annual revenue and more than 2 million customers worldwide who use its software as an essential part of their daily lives.
Headline:
Anywhere, anytime remote access & support for all
 Support your business from anywhere with game-changing, secure remote solutions.
ShortDescription: LogMeIn, Inc.’s category-defining products unlock the potential of the modern workforce by making it possible for millions of people and businesses around the globe to do their best work, whenever, however, and most importantly, wherever.

Highlights.name: Remote Access Software and Support Solutions
Highlights.description: LogMeIn offers a variety of remote access software and support solutions for IT management and support, IT access, and communication and collaboration. Their products are designed to be easy to deploy and scale, and they work closely with customers to ensure their success.

Highlights.name: Easy-to-Deploy and Scalable Solutions
Highlights.description: The article emphasizes that LogMeIn's solutions are easy to deploy and scale. This is important for businesses of all sizes, as it allows them to quickly get up and running with the tools they need.

Highlights.name: Focus on Customer Success
Highlights.description: LogMeIn highlights their commitment to customer success. They work closely with customers to ensure that they are getting the most out of their products.
